Question_1: How would you rate the effectiveness of the sequencing and paragraph breaks in the essay?
Question_2: How would you rate the strength and invitingness of the beginning of the essay?
Question_3: How would you rate the smoothness and effectiveness of the transitions among all elements (sentences, paragraphs, ideas) in the essay?
Question_4: How would you rate the fit of the details in the essay, in terms of where they are placed?
Question_5: How would you rate the overall organization of the essay in terms of its ability to move the reader through the text easily?
Question_6: How would you rate the sense of resolution or closure at the end of the essay?
Question_7: How would you rate the predictability of the organizational structure in the essay?
Question_8: How would you rate the development and subtlety of the beginning and conclusion of the essay?
Question_9: How would you rate the effectiveness of the transitions in the essay, in terms of avoiding stilted or formulaic language?
Question_10: How would you rate the overall structure of the essay in terms of its ability to convey the main point?
Question_11: How would you rate the clarity and consistency of the sequencing and paragraph breaks in the essay?
Question_12: How would you rate the presence and effectiveness of a recognizable beginning, body, and ending in the essay?
Question_13: How would you rate the overall coherence of the essay, in terms of its ability to convey a clear main point?
Question_14: How would you rate the overall organization of the essay in terms of its ability to engage the reader and convey the main point effectively?
